text: NBC is an Japanese pay television owned by NBCUniversal International Networks. The channel is available on SKY PerfecTV. The channel launched on 24 June 1999. The channel aired shows from the US NBC in Japanese. Since the closure of the Taiwanese version of NBC on 25 May 2025, the Japanese version of NBC is the only surviving feed of NBC in Asia. Category:NBC Category:Television channels in Asia
title: NBC (Japanese TV channel)
